message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I think you'd find it valuable. I'm offering it to you for $120. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest.  I could potentially come down to $110, but I can't go any lower than that. It's a very fair price for what you're getting.
I'm still interested in the product, but I can only go up to $95. That's my final offer.
